attributes.action: We want the government to close schools to prevent more infections.
attributes.additional_details: Only in this way can we reduce the number of people infected and get it under control.The government must pay more attention to it！Inattention at first will lead to the final outbreak！ We don't have the ability to kill the virus yet, so it's up to each of us to take precautions.It's to protect everyone！If there is an infected person in the school, all the people in the school will be infected！So please the government to take measures now！Everyone should pay attention to it！Please...and pray...
attributes.background: More and more places' people are infected with the new virus.We can only take the initiative to do a good job of prevention, to prevent more people infected.I think we should pay as much attention to it as China.Close the schools！Wear the masks！Don't gather！Don't regard a man with mask as monster！
